titles.title: A bill to designate the Sunderland National Salmon Station located in Sunderland, Massachusetts, as the "Richard Cronin National Salmon Station".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Referred to Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House by House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries. Report No: 100-671.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.

vote.text: Passed House by Yea-Nay Vote: 407 - 0 (Record Vote No: 171).

action.text: Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Subcommittee on Environmental Protection. Approved for full committee consideration without amendment favorably.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Burdick without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1055.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

committee.subcommittee: Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment
committee.name: House Merchant Marine and Fisheries

bill.summary: 4/13/1988--Introduced. Designates the Sunderland National Salmon Station located in Sunderland, Massachusetts, as the Richard Cronin National Salmon Station.
